title: | Video | Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil: Drashti Dhami's husband visits her on the sets of the show | Television Videos | - India Today
text:
Feedback 
Popular show Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil's lead actress Drashti Dhami recently got a sweet surprise. Drashti, popularly known by her screen name Naina, was paid a visit by her husband. Yep, you read that right. Now, isn't that super-sweet? Naina confessed to SBB saying that Neeraj (her husband) is making all kinds of efforts to make her feel special as it is their anniversary week. Now, that is very thoughtful of Neeraj. Neeraj also bonded well with the lead actor of the show Arjun Bijlani, who plays Drashti's love interest on the show. 
Drashti and Neeraj have been married for almost two years now. Next Video
